Name: SSRS Report Backup
Description: Automatically performs a back up of all SSRS reports on an SSRS Server.
Author: bleep-io

Parameters.Name: reportServer
Parameters.Label: SSRS URL
Parameters.HelpText: The URL of the Report Server including any ports.

Parameters.Name: version
Parameters.Label: SSRS Version
Parameters.HelpText: The version of your SSRS instance e.g. 2005, 2008, 2012

Parameters.Name: folder
Parameters.Label: Export Folder
Parameters.HelpText: The folder on the Deployment machine where the reports should be Saved.
